sub_title: Projectmanager | E-commerce | Digital Marketing | Branding | Digital Project Management
summary:
INTERIM | E-COMMERCE |  DIGITAL PROJECTMANAGER | FREELANCER | AGILE WORKING |

I'm your dedicated digital project management expert, here to cater to all your branding, project planning, and digital strategy needs. My passion lies in helping you transform your vision into reality, from the very concept to the final execution.

profile_positions.description:
I'm your dedicated digital project management expert, here to cater to all your branding, project planning, and digital strategy needs. My passion lies in helping you transform your vision into reality, from the very concept to the final execution.

My skill set encompasses a wide array of services, including project management, branding, crafting buyer personas, developing unique house styles, setting up engaging websites and webshops, and meticulously planning digital strategies. My expertise shines through in my adept use of agile project management techniques, ensuring your projects are completed with efficiency and precision.

One of the ongoing projects that truly excites me is the creation of an upscale clinic specializing in face & neck plastic surgery. In this role, I'm deeply engaged in collaborating with the client to shape the clinic's brand and strategy. From establishing its physical presence to curating compelling online experiences through websites and social media channels, I'm also at the helm of executing targeted marketing campaigns and fostering valuable collaborations.

My strengths lie in the domains of digital marketing, online marketing, campaign management, e-commerce strategies, and of course, project management.
profile_positions.title: Digital Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Holiday Home  |  Casa Joya Nerja  |  Beach House Nerja  |  Malaga, Spain  |
Casa Joya is a comfortable and luxurious holiday home close to the beach in Nerja 
casajoyanerja.com

With our personal holiday home we focus on delivering an inspiring, luxurious and above all unforgettable experience in Nerja, Spain.

WHO WE ARE
Lisa & Bram, a Dutch couple with roots in both the Netherlands and Indonesia.
After studying in Spain and travelling all over the world we met in Amsterdam and decided to start exploring the world together. We love living in Amsterdam, enjoying the chaos and energy of an international city. Nevertheless we also love to have our space, tranquility and be outdoors. Two years ago we decided to investigate if we could combine both worlds, resulting in Casa Joya Nerja. It took us 6 months of renovations to create the most authentic personal holiday home possible. In our opinion it has everything you need for an ultimate feeling of space and tranquillity, but at the same time being close to the vibrant city of Nerja and having tons of outdoor activities around the corner.

DREAM BIG
We strive to inspire others to also dream big and let intuitivity guide you sometimes. We want to share our experience and thus share our personal holiday home with you. With our passion and attention to detail, the property will transform from a holiday house into your holiday home during your stay. With a little help and tips from us, we believe you will change from being a visitor to feeling like a local.

A HIDDEN GEM
Casa Joya Nerja is located in a quiet area, yet at walking distance from bars and restaurants. It is close to the mountains, yet at walking distance to the beach. We think it is the perfect combination to have your holiday, whatever your needs are. In the future we would love to create more Casa Joya’s so we can offer different kinds of experiences!
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Experienced, people-driven marketer with excellent track record in delivering business growth across different product categories and channels in B2C environments.

Core expertise:
- Product Owner for re-platforming Redbrick (from a Magento installation to Shopify)
- Website development (content marketing, product data management, managing e-commerce partner, bug fixing and optimization)
- Branding for our 5 accounts (Reebok, Redbrick, Vismo, Grisport and Mr. Miles)
- Shoe Finder (building from A to Z of configuration called the Shoe Finder for our 5 B2C shops)
- Set up campaigns (Strategic session, Briefing to planning and budget management rollout)

Accounts: redbrick.eu, mrmiles.eu, vismonederland.nl, reebokworkbyallshoes.nl, grisportsafety.eu and cfalliance.eu
profile_positions.title: Marketing Coordinator + E-commerce

profile_positions.description:
The Office Manager position requires stellar organization skills, efficiency, personability and doing whatever it takes to promote a happy and productive office environment.

- Coordinating operational processes
- Office initiatives (to improve the happiness factor) and Office finances
- Employee online and offline events 
- Innovation development and project management (setting up and working with project management tool Asana, rolled out across the entire organization)

For the Marketing Officer role I feel passionate about delivering truly relevant solutions and telling authentic engaging stories around them.

Core expertise:
- Creating social media content (managing 4 online brands: Redbrick, Mr. Miles, Vismo and Grisport)
- Creating marketing plans 
- Daily management of our 4 B2C shops and setting up optimization projects
- Building in-depth understanding of the consumer/customer/user and their journey
- Influencer Marketing 
- Facebook en Google Shopping
- Marketplaces (Amazon & Bol.com)

Accounts: redbrick.eu, mrmiles.eu, vismonederland.nl and grisportsafety.eu
profile_positions.title: Office Manager & Marketing Officer

company.name: Ohbabyshower • Een alles-in-één-pakket. Van A tot Z is de babyshower geregeld! •

profile_positions.company: Ohbabyshower • Een alles-in-één-pakket. Van A tot Z is de babyshower geregeld! •
profile_positions.description:
Ohbabyshower.nl
Choose for a full service babyshower at our beautiful location on the Keizersgracht in Amsterdam. 
Or shop online one of our favorites babyshower products.

Ohbabyshower, I have been inspired by the possibilities to organize a baby shower "without hassle". At the end of last year I quit my job to make this dream come true; a webshop with an all-in-one package. You no longer have to visit 10 stores, but with 1 push of a button you have everything you need to carry out a babyshower from A to Z.

With this, Ohbabyshower makes the difference by delivering everything personally and customized throughout the Netherlands. You can indicate in the webshop how many people you are with and we will ensure that the package can be carried out based on this number. We are able to produce beautiful designs regarding the decoration, fun assignments and a goodie bag gift for the perfect babyshower!

In addition to the online package, we can offer an extra service on location. As it were, you can join right away and no one has to arrange anything for the babyshower.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
Manage all the workflows of shoots, press days and meetings/workshops of the busy in-house studios (daylight studio and boardroom studio).
Respond to all client inquiries, issues, and concerns in a positive and timely manner. 
Oversee all client wishes and requirements for custom made productions (project management) .

Create a strong pool of part timers and manage all interns in the studio.
Oversee communications with clients, partners, accounts and the studio team and resolve any problems that may arise during productions.
Work with vendors to ensure all facilities, maintenance, equipment, and supplies needs are met.
Motivate and proactively strive to get the best out of each team member, offer coaching and manage a team.
Work closely with all team members to manage day-to-day operations of a studio and implement company-wide strategies, policies, and procedures. 

Maintain and improve file management process and procedures.
Foster relationships with partners, clients as well as key influencers and potential partners.
Develop local initiatives and marketing strategies to drive unique traffic and exceed studio-specific goals for the boardroom (latest studio).
Run, analyze, and report on key performance indicators, including sales, utilization, retention, expenses, and payroll. 

Accounts:  Heineken, Vogue, Lee, Tommy Hilfiger, NPO, De Bijenkorf, KSWISS, Out & About, PAUW, &C, Cluse, UPR, Noppies, Viva Mama, Domino’s Pizza, IMA, Levi’s, Nike, Coebergh, Bestseller, OONA, Kek Mama, Veloretti and many more.
profile_positions.title: Studio Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: Managing and aligning clients, art & copy (creation), dtp, productions and suppliers. Projectmanagement from A - Z, from concept to roll-out, including timing and budget. Projects are offline (TV, print and OOH) and online (website, social and digital campaigns).

Accounts: Heineken International, Sony Mobile, Vodafone Ziggo, hollandsnieuwe, Akzo Nobel (Flexa) and Nysingh
profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: Sales and account management of custom made activation products (solid and blow up): development, monitoring budget and timing, internal and external planning and customer contact/evaluation.

Accounts: Bureau Reuring (Google), SUNDIO group, Chase (Coca-Cola), B2S, Mixmash Records and OLVG
profile_positions.title: Accountmanager

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: creation of new business and maintaining good relationships with existing customers by contacting them on a regular basis and informing them through presentations and events.

Accounts: Key accounts (Bol.com and Bijenkorf) and multi brands (retail stores)
profile_positions.title: Junior Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: implementation of marketing campaigns, customer contact and monitoring execution of field marketing activations

Accounts: Diageo (Captain Morgan), Coca-Cola, AB INBev (Jupiler), Maestro, Perfetti van Melle (Mentos) and Bavaria.
profile_positions.title: Event Coordinator
